data.post_title: Debugging lambdas using the serverless framework + serverless-webpack.
data.post_content: Our team has started to use the serverless-framework to create microservices. We have built API's for basic CRUD features to full fledged ETL processes which pipe our microservice data back to our reporting database. This framework saves us a lot of time and gives us guidelines to organize our lambda's and AWS resources into categorized services...
